title: Buffer may be uninitialized in AVX code: Set -Wno-maybe-uninitialized in build
body_html:
5:24:05 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/aten/build/src/ATen/native/cpu/ReduceOpsKernel.cpp.AVX2.cpp:132:9: warning: 'buf[15l]' may be used uninitialized in this function [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
15:24:05          out[j + cols_rounded] = buf[j];
15:24:05          ^
15:24:05 /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/aten/build/src/ATen/native/cpu/ReduceOpsKernel.cpp.AVX2.cpp:121:16: note: 'buf[15l]' was declared here
15:24:05        scalar_t buf[WIDTH];
15:24:05                 ^

CC @colesbury
